summary: Experienced Customer Service Representative with over 10 years of experience in the healthcare industry, including 8+ years with Humana, Passport and Excellus BCBS of NY. Skilled in training seasonal associates during Open Enrollment and serving as a Client Subject Matter Expert for SHPS, Inc.
skills: Familiar with commercial and private insurance carriers
CMS Pricers, DRG Calculator, ICD-9, CPT

experience.title: Claims Subject Matter Expert
experience.description: Adept multi-tasker; Office support (phones, faxing, filing); Fast Learner; Records management professional; ICD-10; Familiar with commercial and private insurance carrier; Insurance and collections procedures; DRG and PC grouping; Understands insurance benefits; Ambulance coding familiarity; Composed and professional demeanor; Research and data analysis; Excellent problem solver; Close attention to detail; Worked on special projects; Responsible for meeting claims production goal of 200 claims per day; Processed professional HCFA 1500, ambulance, anesthesia, labs, office visits; Responsible for claims processing for Medicaid plans for HMO 7 University Health and HMO 9 AHCSS; Worked as a claims subject matter expert for Banner Health Benefit Plan Admin./Client Service Expert.

experience.title: Client Service Expert
experience.company: Banner Health Benefit Plan Admin./Client Service Expert
experience.description: Responsible for duties in support of all departmental efficiencies as assigned by management; Scheduled refills per the patients' plan benefit; Keyed orders and sent for fulfillment; Processed RX refills for customers; Assisted with outbound calling to providers, patient and pharmacies to obtain additional info need to process the RX refill; Answered incoming calls.

experience.title: Provider Claims Service Unit Representative I
experience.description: Responsible for immediate responses to incoming provider calls regarding claims issues; Reprocessing claims as identified through incoming calls or submitted by provider relations staff; Passport Health (Medicaid) and Passport Advantage; Documenting calls, problems, and resolutions for future reference; Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook; Worked on special projects.

experience.title: Benefits Plan Administration / Eligibility & Enrollment / Client Service Expert
experience.description: Answered incoming calls regarding eligibility, claims processing, and billing inquiries; Administered employee group benefits; Resolved issues for billing, carrier eligibility, etc.; Organized special projects; Team lead / initiated training for full-time and temporary associates for ongoing call center and open enrollment.

experience.title: Customer Service Claims Specialist - Chicago Medicare/ Commercial/ Medicaid
experience.description: Supported Chicago Medicare, Medicaid and Commercial Markets; Received inbound and outbound calls from insured members, clients, brokers, agents and providers; Processed medical claims that needed adjustment; Knowledgeable of DRG, ICD-9, CPT coding; Managed high call volume with tact and professionalism; Documented, researched and resolved customer service issues.

experience.title: Claims Subject Matter Expert
experience.description: Contracted claims expert for Excellus BCBS of NY; Responsible for claims processing for the HOME Commercial, Medicare and Medicaid plans; Processed claims with the HOST side of the plan updating provider files and credentials to support claims adjustment; Worked on special projects as assigned.

experience.title: Claims Examiner
experience.description: Responsible for data processing incoming Hospital UB's for Medicare/ KPSA Plan; Contract interpretation to validate proper payment logic for claim adjudication; Identify billing and coding errors and submit documentation to providers for corrected claims; Adjudicate Replacement, Late charge claims etc. per client guidelines; Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, CMS Pricers, DRG Calculator, ICD-9, CPT; Thorough understanding of Medicare compliance guidelines.

experience.title: Claims Subject Matter Expert / DST
experience.description: Worked as a Claims Examiner for DST Solutions based out of Delaware; Responsible for processing Commercial and Medicare Plans; Adjusted backlog claims using the client's claims system for adjudication; Knowledgeable of Citrix platform for applications; Utilized Claims Matrix to determine authorization for Delivery, Well Baby Newborn, Inpatient Claims, Nursing Home, etc.

experience.title: Patient Access Representative I
experience.description: Responsible for duties in support of departmental efficiencies which may include scheduling, registration, patient pre-admission and admission, reception and discharge functions; Verify medical benefits and eligibility with payers and calculate patient liability collection amounts; Completes the whole patient financial clearance process; Educates patients on liability and collection of patient liabilities; Secures insurance authorizations; Performs payment reconciliation & secured payment entry.
